sub_title: Digital Oilfields Consultant and Owner at Smart Collaboration Consultancy
summary:
Independent consultant advising on design of Digital Oilfields in oil and gas. Extensive experience from 32 years in Shell. Global expert in Digital Oilfields and Collaborative Work Environments, led the programme of 50 successful implementations in the largest assets in Shell. 

Broad experience in oil and gas, in Digital Oilfield technology, Process design, Change Management, Petroleum Engineering and Production.
SPE Distinguished Lecturer on Digital Oilfields in 2016/2017. Co-organiser of SPE Intelligent Energy conferences.

Founded Smart Collaboration Consultancy in 2016. Now advising oil and gas operators in Middle East, Europe, Asia and South America.
